Suite.Name: Suite
Suite.Help: Choose suite to run or all to run all suites. A list of comma separated arguments will allow to run multiple suites.

Test.Name: Test
Test.Help: Choose test to run or all to run all tests in the selected suites. A list of comma separated arguments will allow to run all tests in the selected suites.

SearchMode.Name: Search Mode
SearchMode.Help: List tests available to run as well the suite they belong to or only the available suites. Arguments -t or --test and -s or --suite can be used to narrow down the search.

List.Name: List
List.Help: List tests available to run as well the suite they belong to or only the available suites. Arguments -t or --test and -s or --suite can be used to narrow down the search.
